type: Insurance brokerage services and consulting services
short_summary: VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking an insurance brokerage providing insurance brokerage and consulting services.
description: VIA Rail Canada Inc. requires an insurance brokerage offering multi-disciplinary services with a deep understanding and expertise related to passenger railway insurance.
full_summary:
### Insurance Brokerage Services and Consulting Services
#### Invitation to Tender: MX-443296721324

---

#### Notice Type:
Open Tender

#### Tender Closing Date:
December 5, 2024 2:00 PM EST

#### Contact:
Shiyao Fei, Procurement Specialist
VIA Rail Canada Inc.
514-871-6000

---

#### Tender Description:
VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking a reputable insurance brokerage firm to provide multi-disciplinary services related to passenger railway insurance, including access to international insurance markets. The selected contractor must have experience in managing large-scale insurance programs and possess a deep understanding of the applicable legislation.

#### Mandatory Requirements:
* The contractor must possess the following minimum insurance coverage:
	+ Commercial General Liability Insurance of [$5,000,000]
	+ Standard Owner's Form Automobile Liability Insurance, if applicable, of [$2,000,000]
	+ Professional Liability Insurance of [$25,000,000]
* The contractor must have the required permits and licenses (Federal/Provincial)
* The contractor must have operated in the field of insurance brokerage and risk management for a minimum period of 20 years
* The contractor must have direct access to specialized international insurance markets
* The contractor must provide services in both official languages of Canada and have bilingual staff

---

#### Additional Information:

·	All mandatory requirement details can be found in the attached solicitation package.
·	Bidders must submit their proposal in English or French.
·-security screening will be performed, as may be required under any contract or agreement resulting from this tender.
·	for complete details and a span quotations, please see [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com).
